responses: Hello! Welcome to Porsche. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! I'm your Porsche assistant. What would you like to know?
Greetings! I'm here to help you explore our Porsche lineup. What interests you?
Thank you for visiting Porsche! Feel free to return if you have more questions.
Goodbye! We hope to see you at one of our dealerships soon.
Take care! Don't hesitate to reach out if you need more information.
You're welcome! Is there anything else you'd like to know?
My pleasure! How else can I assist you?
Happy to help! What else interests you about our Porsche models?
We offer a range of Porsche 911 models including the Carrera, Carrera S, Carrera 4 GTS, Turbo S, and GT3. Which model interests you?
Our current 911 lineup includes the Carrera, Carrera S, Carrera 4 GTS, Turbo S, and GT3. Would you like to know more about any specific model?
The Porsche 911 family includes several variants: Carrera, Carrera S, Carrera 4 GTS, Turbo S, and GT3. Which one would you like to explore?

The price varies by model. The Carrera starts at $101,200, Carrera S at $116,000, Carrera 4 GTS at $138,300, Turbo S at $203,500, and GT3 at $161,100. Would you like to know more about financing options?
Our models range from $101,200 for the Carrera to $203,500 for the Turbo S. We offer various financing and lease options. Would you like to explore those?
Prices start at $101,200 for the Carrera and go up to $203,500 for the Turbo S. We have flexible financing options available. Would you like to learn more?
Performance varies by model. The Carrera has 385 PS, the Carrera S 450 PS, the Carrera 4 GTS 480 PS, the Turbo S 650 PS, and the GT3 510 PS. Would you like specific details about any model?
Our models offer exceptional performance. The Carrera accelerates 0-60 mph in 4.0 seconds, while the Turbo S achieves it in just 2.6 seconds. Which model's performance interests you?
Each model offers unique performance characteristics. The GT3 revs to 9000 RPM, while the Turbo S delivers 800 Nm of torque. Would you like to know more about a specific model?
We offer extensive customization through our Exclusive Manufaktur program, including Paint to Sample, Interior Packages, and model-specific options. Which model would you like to customize?
You can personalize your Porsche with various options including exterior colors, interior packages, and performance upgrades. Would you like to explore the options for a specific model?
Our customization options include exclusive colors, interior packages, and performance enhancements. Each model has unique options available. Which model interests you?
We'd be happy to arrange a test drive! We have dealerships in New York and Beverly Hills. Would you like to schedule a test drive at either location?
Test drives are available at our dealerships. We have locations in New York and Beverly Hills, both offering the Porsche Experience. Which location works best for you?
You can schedule a test drive at our dealerships in New York or Beverly Hills. Both locations offer the full Porsche Experience. Would you like to book a test drive?
We offer standard financing with terms from 36-72 months starting at 2.9% APR, and lease programs from 24-36 months starting at $1,299 monthly. Would you like more details?
Our financing options include standard loans and lease programs. We can work with various credit situations. Would you like to explore which option might work best for you?
We have flexible financing solutions including loans and leases. Our team can help you find the best option for your situation. Would you like to learn more?
We offer maintenance packages starting at $2,500 for basic service and $4,500 for premium coverage, both covering 4 years/50,000 miles. Would you like details about what's included?
Our maintenance packages include comprehensive service coverage. The basic package starts at $2,500, while the premium package at $4,500 includes additional services. Would you like to know more?
We provide maintenance packages with different levels of coverage. All packages include essential services and extend for 4 years/50,000 miles. Would you like to explore the options?

We have dealerships in New York and Beverly Hills. Both locations offer sales, service, parts, and test drives. The Beverly Hills location also features a Porsche Experience Center. Which location would you like to visit?
Our dealerships are located in New York and Beverly Hills. Both are open Monday through Saturday 9AM-7PM and Sunday 11AM-5PM. Would you like to schedule a visit?
You can visit our dealerships in New York or Beverly Hills. Both offer comprehensive services and the Beverly Hills location includes a Porsche Experience Center. Which location would you prefer?
